title: Tech Lead for long term engagement
description: Description: We are a growing software development firm seeking a skilled client-facing Tech Lead to join our team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for managing software development projects, coordinating work across a small team of developers, providing front-line support, and working closely with clients to ensure successful project delivery. For the right candidate, this could be a long-term engagement that will provide consistent hours that can ramp up as you learn the tech stack and operating environment. The ideal candidate will have a good mix of technical skills, be a good communicator, present well to clients, with some project and product management capabilities to execute effectively. We have a long-standing multi-year relationship with this client and, as a result, this role has significant long-term potential. Several of our team members have been working on this account for 3+ years. It is just as important that you gel with our internal team as it is that you gel with our key client contacts. Technology Landscape: ● ReactJS + SCSS ● React Native + Expo ● Django + Python 3 ● Wordpress 6.4 ● MySQL ● Ubuntu Server 18.04 ● .NET Core ● Windows Server 2022 ● SQL Server 2022 ● Symmetric DS Database sync The ideal candidate has at least some competence in most of these technologies and significant experience in at least a few of them. Responsibilities: ● Manage a team of software developers, providing technical guidance and mentorship ● Work directly with clients to gather project requirements, understand their needs, and translate them into actionable tasks for the development team ● As a key client-facing team member, you will be on the front-line for client support issues. You will be able to effectively problem solve and coordinate resolution activities across internal and external teams. ● A mix of project management, product management, and technical skills to develop effective solutions, manage client expectations, and provide timely deliverables. ● Hands on technical ability to build solutions alongside the technical team and, as needed, quickly resolve issues without handoff to team members. Required Skills and Experience: ● Fluent in English ● Comfortable working in US Eastern time zone’s business hours. ● Proficiency in a major portion of our technology landscape (see above) ● Proven experience leading software development teams ● Strong management skills - both of team members and of one’s self. ● Effective and professional communicator (both written and verbal) ● Process oriented and capable of managing multiple projects, tasks and timelines ● Ability to work effectively with clients and manage their expectations ● In-depth understanding of software development methodologies and best practices ● Ability to work with a high degree of autonomy while keeping key parties informed and included. A major plus if you have skills in the following: ● Familiarity with design principles and user experience (UX) best practices ● Experience working with designers and turning Figma designs into functioning software ● Agile development experience (e.g., Scrum, Kanban) ● Ability to author requirements for client-facing review and approval. ● Experience estimating effort and duration for projects ● Experience working in agencies or in a consultant capacity
